subject: Marcos Leite
object: Selected by the Portland Trail Blazers

subject: Marcos Leite
object: 1967-1974: Fluminense, 1976-1978: Athletic Genova, 1978-1980: E.C. Sírio, 1980-1981: Virtus Bologna, 1981-1984: E.C. Sírio, 1984: C.R. Flamengo, 1985: E.C. Bradesco, 1986-1989: E.C. Sírio

subject: Marcos Leite
object: FIBA Intercontinental Cup champion (1979), 2× South American Club champion (1978, 1979), 3× Brazilian champion (1979, 1983, 1989), 3× São Paulo State champion (1978, 1979), 6× Rio de Janeiro State champion (1970-1974, 1984), 3× All-American Honorable Mention (1974-1976), WCAC Player of the Year (1976), 2× First-team All-WCAC (1975, 1976), Second-team All-WCAC (1974), WCAC Freshman of the Year (1974)

subject: Marcos Leite
object: Silver medal - second place (1970 Yugoslavia), Bronze medal - third place (1978 Philippines)

subject: Marcos Leite
object: Gold medal - first place (1971 Cali), Bronze medal - third place (1975 Mexico City), Bronze medal - third place (1979 San Juan), Silver medal - second place (1983 Caracas)

subject: Marcos Leite
object: Gold medal - first place (1971 Uruguay, 1973 Colombia, 1983 Brazil), Silver medal - second place (1979 Argentina, 1981 Uruguay)
